name: The Ultimate Quest for the Golden Lillypad
name_original: The Ultimate Quest for the Golden Lillypad
description:
Play as Dwayne "The Frog" Johnson as he quests to acquire the fabled Golden Lillypad

Avoid Venom Spitting Spiders in this Turn-Based Roguelike with 30 randomly generated levels.

This game was developed for the Rogue Like Game Jam, where we were tasked to develop our own Game Engine. Mine can be found here:

https://github.com/curtonius/CurtoniusEngine

WASD to Move

Arrow Keys to Rotate

Space to extend tongue to eat Spiders
